data.message: My oversharing friends are Facebook ads. Can I unfollow them as a category? I am not anti-advertising. I know ads keep FB free, however, they belong in the right hand column as sponsored content. There's lots of room. I look there and click on those of interest.  But I will never ever click on an ad in the newsfeed.  They could advertise free money and I wouldn't click on it.  And please stop asking why I hide every ad in my newsfeed.  Duh--it's an ad.

replies.message: Hey Mary. Ads help keep Facebook free and we strive to only show ads that are relevant and interesting to you. Please share your feedback on how we can improve this experience here: http://on.fb.me/1M3RtF8. -Abby
